Class QueryDriver

  • java.lang.Object
    • QueryDriver

  • public class QueryDriver
extends java.lang.Object
    this is the part of the application that interfaces with the sql database. There is no other class in application that is connected with the database. It all must go through here. this way it is consolidated for easier debugging
    Author:
    noahs
